articles.description: How bad boy stars are enabled by the game
articles.content:
Rugby league legend Brad Fittler has admitted the game needs to improve the way it handles its wayward young stars, in light of the very public meltdown from Manly's Addin Fonua-Blake.
The prop was … [+3752 chars]

articles.title: Adelaide Crows' Reilly O'Brien calls West Coast Eagles ruck opponent Nic Naitanui 'lazy and unfit' in accidental tweet - ABC News
articles.description: Adelaide Crows ruckman Reilly O'Brien is left to cover his tracks after accidentally tweeting out game notes in which he calls rival West Coast ruck Nic Naitanui "lazy and unfit".
articles.content:
Adelaide Crows ruckman Reilly O'Brien says a broken phone is to blame for a tweet in which he called West Coast ruck Nic Naitanui "lazy and unfit".
O'Brien, who is due to face All-Australian Naitanu… [+1274 chars]

articles.description: Things are dire at the Broncos and the noise will only get louder until they snap a six-match losing streak.
articles.content:
